price: 30. То bazali koloba ete: Azali mokomi ntoki, tozela likama naye ya liwa.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
